text:
Azeem Haq is a Canadian audio producer and songwriter. He is based in Toronto. Haq is known for the anthem "GO LEAFS GO" which was the anthem of Toronto Maple Leafs during NHL Playoffs 2017. In 2016, Haq won a 26th Radio And Production Award for "Best feature production".
Career.
Haq started his music career at an early age. He gained commercial success with his former hip-hop group EOS. Several songs from EOS were aired in the Local radio stations. was runner-up in the 25th Radio And Production Awards. In 2017, his anthem "Go Leafs Go" for the Toronto Maple Leafs went viral and was featured by CBS Sports, City TV News, TSN and Breakfast Television. According to The Sports Network's BarDown, 'Go Leafs Go' by Azeem Haq was an anthem perfect for a Toronto playoff run.
